origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'EducationPlatform.get_course_catalog', 'description': 'Get the catalog of courses offered by an education platform.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'platform', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the education platform.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'catalog', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing details about the courses.'}]}, {'name': 'EducationPlatform.get_student_enrollment', 'description': 'Get the number of students enrolled in a course.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'course_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The ID of the course.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'enrollment', 'description': 'The number of students enrolled in the course.'}]}, {'name': 'EducationPlatform.get_course_reviews', 'description': 'Get reviews for a course.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'course_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The ID of the course.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'reviews', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing reviews for the course.'}]}, {'name': 'EducationPlatform.get_platform_trends', 'description': 'Get the latest trends in the education platform.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'platform', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the education platform.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'trends', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing the latest trends.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
获取在线教育平台VIPKID的课程目录。接下来，获取VIPKID某门课程的学生注册人数。然后，获取该课程的评价。最后，获取VIPKID平台的最新趋势。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取在线教育平台VIPKID的课程目录。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'platform'的值是什么?
